setting.location: University lecture hall with scientific charts and models, representing modern education and progress
setting.weather: Bright afternoon light streaming through tall academic windows

characters.appearance: Young man, late 20s, intellectual appearance, energetic bearing, dark hair, bright enthusiastic eyes
characters.clothing: Dark academic jacket, white shirt with simple tie, practical boots, ink stains on fingers from writing
characters.position: Standing before blackboard covered with scientific diagrams and equations
characters.action: Gesturing enthusiastically while explaining scientific concepts to small group of interested listeners

characters.appearance: Middle-aged man, 40s, tall athletic build, listening intently with thoughtful expression
characters.clothing: Well-tailored dark suit, expensive but conservative, hands clasped behind back
characters.position: Standing among small audience, leaning forward with genuine interest
characters.action: Asking penetrating questions and taking mental notes, clearly engaged with progressive ideas

scene.mainElements: Academic lecture hall with high ceilings, blackboard covered with scientific formulas and diagrams, wooden demonstration table with scientific instruments, charts showing technological innovations
scene.details: Glass cases displaying geological specimens and scientific models, skeleton of some creature for anatomical study, telescope and other precision instruments, stacks of scientific journals and books, globe showing world geography, prisms and optical equipment, measuring devices and brass instruments gleaming in afternoon light
scene.background: Tall windows with institutional frames, bookshelves reaching to ceiling filled with academic texts, portrait of some scientific pioneer
scene.atmosphere: Intellectual excitement and progressive optimism, sense of science offering solutions to human problems, meeting of practical merchant mind with theoretical scientific vision, hope for rational progress, no text or letters visible

composition.cameraAngle: Medium shot showing both the enthusiastic lecturer and attentive older student
composition.focus: The exchange of ideas between generations representing different approaches to progress
composition.depth: Foreground: scientific instruments and charts, middle: both men engaged in discussion, background: academic setting with books and equipment
